trans-unit.source: Version 2013-08-15
trans-unit.target: Version 2013-08-15

trans-unit.source: Version 2013-08-15 includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: Version 2013-08-15 includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: Per-minute metrics, as well as hourly metrics.
trans-unit.target: Per-minute metrics, as well as hourly metrics.

trans-unit.source: Metrics can be configured via the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: Metrics can be configured via the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: Hourly and minute metrics are also available for the secondary location, if read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Hourly and minute metrics are also available for the secondary location, if read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled.

trans-unit.source: JSON and OData V3 support for the table service.
trans-unit.target: JSON and OData V3 support for the table service.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="086d4db0-0743-4987-b8a7-2cd15090dfd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting the OData Data Service Version Headers</link> and <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="086d4db0-0743-4987-b8a7-2cd15090dfd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting the OData Data Service Version Headers</link> and <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support for the Blob, Table and Queue services.
trans-unit.target: Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support for the Blob, Table and Queue services.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: CORS can be configured via the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: CORS can be configured via the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: To issue the CORS preflight request, call the <link xlink:href="931a6d96-f789-4ca1-819c-10270e569040" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Blob Request</link>, <link xlink:href="1bfbdfec-46d3-44a0-a2a5-b3b501df9039" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Queue Request</link>, or <link xlink:href="d79ffc40-da9a-4bde-b442-27787b083544" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Table Request</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: To issue the CORS preflight request, call the <link xlink:href="931a6d96-f789-4ca1-819c-10270e569040" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Blob Request</link>, <link xlink:href="1bfbdfec-46d3-44a0-a2a5-b3b501df9039" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Queue Request</link>, or <link xlink:href="d79ffc40-da9a-4bde-b442-27787b083544" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Preflight Table Request</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: New operations for determining the status of the secondary location, if read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: New operations for determining the status of the secondary location, if read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled.

trans-unit.source: See the <link xlink:href="d620f436-a721-467f-aae4-0dab65be2174" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Stats (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="fa6926d6-3c89-4c9d-8566-ab207b0b471b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Stats (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="55439696-a6ff-4555-ac43-ade89d357782" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Stats (REST API)</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: See the <link xlink:href="d620f436-a721-467f-aae4-0dab65be2174" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Stats (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="fa6926d6-3c89-4c9d-8566-ab207b0b471b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Stats (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="55439696-a6ff-4555-ac43-ade89d357782" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Stats (REST API)</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: Support for multiple conditional headers for <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: Support for multiple conditional headers for <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: Support for overriding stored blob properties via query parameters on a shared access signature.
trans-unit.target: Support for overriding stored blob properties via query parameters on a shared access signature.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="2686d543-29ff-4b60-a2c0-a505f421ebf9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Constructing the Shared Access Signature URI (REST API)</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="2686d543-29ff-4b60-a2c0-a505f421ebf9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Constructing the Shared Access Signature URI (REST API)</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: It is now possible to delete an uncommitted blob.
trans-unit.target: It is now possible to delete an uncommitted blob.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="7f64072c-fcc6-4e7d-8653-5017dc8da7be" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Blob (REST API)</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="7f64072c-fcc6-4e7d-8653-5017dc8da7be" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Blob (REST API)</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="68b74877-5678-46c1-bdbf-f6a68a73f75b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="ce8d6a62-dbc9-475c-acb4-666a5a9370c8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Container (REST API)</link> operations now return <parameterReference>ETag</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>Last-Modified-Time</parameterReference> response headers.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="68b74877-5678-46c1-bdbf-f6a68a73f75b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="ce8d6a62-dbc9-475c-acb4-666a5a9370c8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Container (REST API)</link> operations now return <parameterReference>ETag</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>Last-Modified-Time</parameterReference> response headers.

trans-unit.source: The Lease Container operation does not modify the container’s <parameterReference>ETag</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>Last-Modified-Time</parameterReference> values.
trans-unit.target: The Lease Container operation does not modify the container’s <parameterReference>ETag</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>Last-Modified-Time</parameterReference> values.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> will fail with 412 (Precondition Failed) if a lease ID was specified but the blob did not previously exist.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> will fail with 412 (Precondition Failed) if a lease ID was specified but the blob did not previously exist.

trans-unit.source: The authorization for the <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> operation allows the client to specify a shared access signature for the destination blob if the copy operation is occurring within the same account.
trans-unit.target: The authorization for the <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> operation allows the client to specify a shared access signature for the destination blob if the copy operation is occurring within the same account.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operation returns the <parameterReference>Accept-Ranges</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operation returns the <parameterReference>Accept-Ranges</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues (REST API)</link> no longer return the <languageKeyword>URL</languageKeyword> field in the enumeration response.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues (REST API)</link> no longer return the <languageKeyword>URL</languageKeyword> field in the enumeration response.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Metrics</languageKeyword> element specified for or returned by <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> in has been changed to <languageKeyword>HourMetrics</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Metrics</languageKeyword> element specified for or returned by <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> in has been changed to <languageKeyword>HourMetrics</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The names of some XML elements specified for <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> have been changed, and many settings are now optional.
trans-unit.target: The names of some XML elements specified for <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> have been changed, and many settings are now optional.

trans-unit.source: The names of the tables where Storage Analytics transactions are stored have been changed.
trans-unit.target: The names of the tables where Storage Analytics transactions are stored have been changed.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c944c107-684c-47bf-92bf-5ce32689b7ae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Metrics</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c944c107-684c-47bf-92bf-5ce32689b7ae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Metrics</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: The Table service now supports the ODATA <parameterReference>Prefer</parameterReference> header, which enables control over the content echo in the response body for the <link xlink:href="e7b7c22f-39d1-46b1-9f3a-0ccaeabde95a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Table (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity (REST API)</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: The Table service now supports the ODATA <parameterReference>Prefer</parameterReference> header, which enables control over the content echo in the response body for the <link xlink:href="e7b7c22f-39d1-46b1-9f3a-0ccaeabde95a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Table (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity (REST API)</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with version 2013-08-15, a shared access signature will no longer collapse "//" to "/" as part of the URL which allows creation and reading of blobs starting with "/".
trans-unit.target: Beginning with version 2013-08-15, a shared access signature will no longer collapse "//" to "/" as part of the URL which allows creation and reading of blobs starting with "/".

trans-unit.source: Note that "//" is no longer allowed anymore as part of the container name portion of the URL.
trans-unit.target: Note that "//" is no longer allowed anymore as part of the container name portion of the URL.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with version 2013-08-15, calling the <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> operation on a blob of size zero bytes with the <parameterReference>range</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-range</parameterReference> header specified returns HTTP status code 416 (Requested Range Not Satisfiable).
trans-unit.target: Beginning with version 2013-08-15, calling the <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> operation on a blob of size zero bytes with the <parameterReference>range</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-range</parameterReference> header specified returns HTTP status code 416 (Requested Range Not Satisfiable).

trans-unit.source: This change is HTTP compliant.
trans-unit.target: This change is HTTP compliant.

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, this operation returned HTTP status code 206 (Partial Content).
trans-unit.target: In previous versions, this operation returned HTTP status code 206 (Partial Content).
